text:
Created attachment 30932
The word document prior to using hpsf to add custom properties.

When using hpsf to add custom properties to a word document the resulting file adds an extra line of white space to each cell in a table if the content is under content control.
creator: nlord@mastercontrol.com

text:
Created attachment 30933
The file after the custom properties have been added.

Note the extra lines added in each cell of the table.
